article.title: Status and history for nbl
article.para: The preamble title (“Preamble” in English) is missing.
One could have expected that the title of article 1 would be “Isivumelwano 1”, but it’s just “Isivumelwano”.
There are two occurrences of U+002D - HYPHEN-MINUS, both surrounded by space; should these be hyphens (w. or w/o. space?) or dashes?

history.history-entry: stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
